SEARCH
Package UI

Class SalesUI

java.lang.Object
UI.BaseUI
UI.SalesUI
public class SalesUI extends BaseUI
The `SalesUI` class extends the `BaseUI` class and represents the user interface for managing sales, generating sales reports, and viewing popular items in the restaurant management system.

    • updatePopularItems

      private void updatePopularItems(LocalDate startDate, LocalDate endDate, Connection conn) throws SQLException
      Updates the popular dish and wine items for the given date range.
      Parameters:
      startDate - The start date of the date range.
      endDate - The end date of the date range.
      conn - The database connection.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If an error occurs while accessing the database.

    • updatePopularItem

      private void updatePopularItem(String query, LocalDate startDate, LocalDate endDate, Connection conn, javafx.scene.text.Text itemText) throws SQLException
      Updates the popular item text with the given SQL query and date range.
      Parameters:
      query - The SQL query to retrieve the popular item.
      startDate - The start date of the date range.
      endDate - The end date of the date range.
      conn - The database connection.
      itemText - The `Text` component to display the popular item name.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If an error occurs while accessing the database.

    • updateSalesGraph

      private void updateSalesGraph(String query, LocalDate startDate, LocalDate endDate, Connection conn, String seriesName) throws SQLException
      Updates the sales graph with the given SQL query, date range, and series name.
      Parameters:
      query - The SQL query to retrieve the sales data.
      startDate - The start date of the date range.
      endDate - The end date of the date range.
      conn - The database connection.
      seriesName - The name of the series to be added to the graph.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If an error occurs while accessing the database.

    • createPopularItemBox

      private javafx.scene.layout.VBox createPopularItemBox(String title, javafx.scene.text.Text itemText, int titleFontSize, int itemFontSize)
      Creates a box for displaying a popular item (dish or wine).
      Parameters:
      title - The title of the box.
      itemText - The `Text` component to display the popular item name.
      titleFontSize - The font size for the title.
      itemFontSize - The font size for the item name.
      Returns:
      The `VBox` containing the popular item box.
